I don't think one more thing is gonna hurt me, right?
translation.fr: je suis plus à une près, hein ?

translation.en: Just be straight up with me.
I'm not gonna have to worry about you, right?
translation.fr: Je peux arrêter de m'inquiéter pour vous ?

translation.en: Right.
I have to go now.
I miss you.
You ready?
-[meows] -All right.
Okay, it won't be long.
Good boy.
